item.title: Plz look here!
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

I’ll use an example, cause I don’t know what you mean :o

Ok say we have this: [scar]
Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers :=6; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer:=StartPlayer; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

 Players[0].Name :='';
 Players[0].Pass :='';
 Players[0].Nick :='';
 Players[0].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[0].Skill:='';
 Players[0].Active:=True;

 Players[1].Name :='';
 Players[1].Pass :='';
 Players[1].Nick :='';
 Players[1].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[1].Skill:='';
 Players[1].Active:=True;

 Players[2].Name :='';
 Players[2].Pass :='';
 Players[2].Nick :='';
 Players[2].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[2].Skill:='';
 Players[2].Active:=True;

 Players[3].Name :='';
 Players[3].Pass :='';
 Players[3].Nick :='';
 Players[3].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[3].Skill:='';
 Players[3].Active:=True;

 Players[4].Name :='';
 Players[4].Pass :='';
 Players[4].Nick :='';
 Players[4].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[4].Skill:='';
 Players[4].Active:=True;

 Players[5].Name :='';
 Players[5].Pass :='';
 Players[5].Nick :='';
 Players[5].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[5].Skill:='';
 Players[5].Active:=True;

 writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers)+' Players');

end;[/scar]

Take out [scar]
Players[1].Name :=’’;
Players[1].Pass :=’’;
Players[1].Nick :=’’;
Players[1].Loc :=‘Loc1’;
Players[1].Skill:=’’;
Players[1].Active:=True;

 Players[2].Name :='';
 Players[2].Pass :='';
 Players[2].Nick :='';
 Players[2].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[2].Skill:='';
 Players[2].Active:=True;

 Players[3].Name :='';
 Players[3].Pass :='';
 Players[3].Nick :='';
 Players[3].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[3].Skill:='';
 Players[3].Active:=True;

 Players[4].Name :='';
 Players[4].Pass :='';
 Players[4].Nick :='';
 Players[4].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[4].Skill:='';
 Players[4].Active:=True;

 Players[5].Name :='';
 Players[5].Pass :='';
 Players[5].Nick :='';
 Players[5].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[5].Skill:='';
 Players[5].Active:=True;[/scar]

And change [scar] HowManyPlayers :=6; // Set Number of Players here.[/scar]

To:[scar] HowManyPlayers :=1; // Set Number of Players here.[/scar]

Then fill in the stuff like this:[scar] Players[0].Name :=‘Zezima’;
Players[0].Pass :=‘iruleall’;
Players[0].Nick :=‘Zezi’; //the first 4 characters of your name. Capitalize the first letter!
Players[0].Loc :=‘Loc1’; //leave this
Players[0].Skill:=‘leave blank if you want’;
Players[0].Active:=True;[/scar]

Read full topic
